actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Secretary of Transportation to reserve slots at high density airports for service to small communities.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 with respect to airspace control and facilities to require the Secretary of Transportation to determine for each high density airport the number of slots needed to be reserved in order to provide adequate air transportation between such airport and eligible small communities. Prescribes guidelines under which the Secretary shall create a pool of such slots and allocate them to air carriers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Secretary of Transportation to reserve slots at high density airports for service to small communities.
